scripts: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS customers CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE customers (id INTEGER, name TEXT);
INSERT INTO customers VALUES (1, 'JOHN GaLT'), (2, 'SANDY COHEN');

expectedOutput.name: JOHN GaLT
expectedOutput.response: Dear John Galt! We received your message and will process it as soon as possible. Thanks for using our service. FooBar On! - FooBarIO team.

expectedOutput.name: SANDY COHEN
expectedOutput.response: Dear Sandy Cohen! We received your message and will process it as soon as possible. Thanks for using our service. FooBar On! - FooBarIO team.

scripts: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS customers CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE customers (id INTEGER, name TEXT);
